frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

version_metadata.author: Paul J. Durack <durack1@llnl.gov>
version_metadata.note: Correct model components for various LS3MIP/LUMIP experiments
